tidbits.title: Pitons' Majesty
tidbits.description: Saint Lucia is famed for the majestic twin peaks called the Pitons, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a symbol of the island's natural beauty.

tidbits.title: Cultural Fusion
tidbits.description: The island's rich cultural heritage blends African, French, and British influences, evident in its music, cuisine, and vibrant local traditions.
